Name: Investigate the Theft of Camp Supplies
Description: Find out the whereabouts of the camp supplies
QuestDesc: Find out the whereabouts of the camp supplies

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover? What a pleasant surprise. I've heard a lot about you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm Beigu, the captain of the camp. Currently caught up in an investigation regarding a theft case.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lollo Logistics regularly delivers supplies to the camp, covering all our needs. When they unloaded the supplies, the quantities matched our order perfectly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, during the nightly inventory check, a team member responsible for counting noticed one box missing, though it was not something important.

Options.PlotLineKey: But we still need to figure out where it went.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. It's packed with everyone's favorite hometown dishes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To treat the soldiers here,  I secretly asked Panhua to prepare a batch of pre-made dishes—

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My apologies. It's been a while since I last visited Jinzhou. I miss the hometown dishes so much.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, I hope you can keep our conversation between us. Unfortunately, I can't conduct the investigation myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For the soldiers here, trust is often more valuable than their lives. It's built through shared experiences and overcoming challenges together. I don't want this incident to sow even the smallest seed of doubt.

Options.PlotLineKey: So you want me to find out the truth for you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a token of gratitude, I'll treat you to a feast at Panhua's Restaurant.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without further ado, you can start by checking the guard post. Investigate the entry and exit records from yesterday afternoon until now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Duying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, Rover! What can I do for you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Duying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, you want to look into the entry and exit records, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Duying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though I just started this post this morning, I can check the duty log for you. It has all personnel entry and exit records. Just give me a moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Duying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Other than the Lollo Logistics delivery folks, there aren't any other entry and exit records.

Options.PlotLineKey: Aren't you curious about why there's an investigation going on?

Dialogues.Speaker: Duying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General Jiyan asked all members of the Midnight Rangers to assist you in any way possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Duying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, whatever your reason is, I'm glad I can help you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wujing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who the hell did this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wujing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Someone spilled the food along the way. The Gray Crested Gulls smelled it and came in swarms. I can't drive them away!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wujing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It took me great effort to clean it up here. Look at what these birds did to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Wujing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, in that case, you should look for Mingyi. She's the one responsible for the storage area in the camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wujing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Usually, Mingyi handles checking the inventory and stocking supplies, while Tianlang and Wuheng take care of loading and unloading supplies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wujing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, you reminded me. I'll need to go ask Mingyi. I'll find out who did this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heavy footsteps. The pace isn't far, as if the person was hauling something weighty.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The shoe prints at the heels show numerous cracks, signaling significant wear and tear at the back of the shoes. It suggests the person walked with a backward-leaning posture.

Options.PlotLineKey: There's something I want to ask you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianlang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, but I'm in the middle of counting the newly arrived field uniforms.

Options.PlotLineKey: Did they come with yesterday's supplies?

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianlang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed. The soldiers' field uniforms are regularly replaced. Some time ago, we collected applications for new uniforms, and some of the reasons on the applications were really... amusing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianlang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are reasons like pants torn by the fangs of a Sabyr Boar or a hat stolen by the Hoochiefs in the Dim Forest...

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianlang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've placed all those application forms on the table in the corner. If you're interested, you can take a look there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianlang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mingyi left for another business for a little while, and during that time, I helped in counting the inventory.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianlang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Another team member, Wuheng, was responsible for loading and unloading the supplies outside the warehouse on her own. I didn't notice anything unusual in the warehouse.

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe the application forms can be a breakthrough.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What… what can I do for you?

Options.PlotLineKey: The oil stains on your clothes…

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, I went back to Jinzhou not long ago. I accidentally splashed some on while eating at Panhua's Restaurant.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover? Did Captain Beiwang send you over?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I reported the missing supplies. I stepped away for a moment during the stocking, and it happened.

Options.PlotLineKey: Did you leave for a moment?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I asked Tianlang to take over for me when I stepped away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tianlang and Duying can both vouch for me! I have an alibi!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There was a package for Duying in the supplies, so... so I just happened to take it to him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I had no other suspicious intentions! I promise!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll go find Tianlang next.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The supply box of Lollo Logistics. The moment it's opened, a pungent fragrance swarms out, but the box is disappointedly empty.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At the box's bottom, a faint sheen of oil lingers. The delightful scent... can't be mistaken! It's Panhua's Restaurant's Poached Chicken.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The more you inhale, the hungrier you become. It's probably wise to leave this spot promptly. Perhaps a chat with the nearby Midnight Rangers could shed light on any observations they've made.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No one entered or left the camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe I should brace myself for the worst. If that's the case, the thief could only be someone from within the camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While you were looking into the entry and exit records, I took the chance to review the surveillance footage from when the supplies were loaded and unloaded.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mingyi, Tianlang, and Wuheng were present throughout the entire process of loading, unloading, and stocking supplies. You might want to start with them to see if you can uncover any useful clues.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, by the way, the unloading area is a blind spot in the surveillance. Rover, you might discover some hidden clues there. I'm counting on you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Applicant: Duying
Request: Replacement of the upper garment
Reason: While rescuing a researcher kidnapped by the Exiles, the upper garment was pierced through by bullets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Applicant: Kelin
Request: Replacement of the hat
Reason: Accidentally offended Gray Crested Gulls and therefore received their gifts dropping from the sky all the time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like Wujing is going to face some challenges too...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Applicant: Wuheng
Request: Replacement of the boots
Reason: Carrying heavy loads led to severe wear on the heels, causing frequent falls.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The description seems to align with the shoe print characteristics near the supply box. Just to be sure, go and confirm with the individual involved.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I also have a preliminary speculation. Rover, who do you think took away the supplies?

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a bit different from what I expected. Maybe it's someone else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a bit different from what I expected. Maybe it's someone else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like we're on the same page. Let's go talk to Wuheng.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, thank you for your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She left her hometown at a young age and has been stationed at the camp for years. No one ever taught her how to handle mistakes, which is why she dealt with them in such a straightforward way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a soldier, she left her post without permission, trying to solve a problem that was beyond her ability. She should have placed more trust in her comrades. There's still much for her to learn.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for those spilled dishes, I'll let Wuheng make up for it by cooking them for us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beigu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, when I return to Jinzhou, let's meet again at Panhua's Restaurant!
